reporting-org.narrative: Bundesministerium für wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung (BMZ)
Federal Ministry for Economic Cooperation and Development (BMZ)

title.narrative: Enhancing the Resilience of Gaza Citizens against volatile Water availability
Stärkung der Resilienz gegenüber volatiler Wasserversorgung in Gaza

description.narrative: Das Projekt plant mit dem Bau von Regenwassersammelbecken dem anhaltenden Wassermangel und der Unzuverlässigkeit dessen Verfügbarkeit entgegen zu wirken. Ein kommunales Reservoir in der Gemeinde Um El Nasser sowie kleinere Becken für rund 200 Landwirte werden Wasser ins Grundwasser kanalisieren sowie zur Bewässerung landwirtschaftlicher Felder dienen. Trainings

The project aims to counter the ongoing water scarcity and unpredictability by constructing rain water harvesting ponds. A communal pond in Um el Nasser as well as smaller ponds for approximately 200 farmers will channel rain water to the ponds, from where it can be added to the aquifer or pumped to the agricultural sites.

Trainings

The project aims to counter the ongoing water scarcity and unpredictability by constructing rain water harvesting ponds. A communal pond in Um el Nasser as well as smaller ponds for approximately 200 farmers will channel rain water to the ponds, from where it can be added to the aquifer or pumped to the agricultural sites.
